aka: You Will Know Neither The Day Nor The Hour

cast.name: 布鲁诺·托德斯奇尼 Bruno Todeschini
娜塔莎·科奇库莫夫 Natacha Koutchoumov

writer.name: 塞缪尔·格朗尚 Samuel Grandchamp

director.name: 塞缪尔·格朗尚 Samuel Grandchamp

this_title: Vous ne connaîtrez ni le jour ni l'heure
trans_title: 你不会知道那一天那一刻
You Will Know Neither The Day Nor The Hour
introduction: Paul's parents, elderly and unwell, have announced their decision to die, together, assisted by an association. In a family that evidently suffers a lack of communication, he is unable to express his doubts and emotions. As he accompanies his parents to a prestigious hotel to spend their last week, he retains the hope to restore dialogue.
chinese_title: 你不会知道那一天那一刻
foreign_title: Vous ne connaîtrez ni le jour ni l'heure
